properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ENROLL_DATE, AD_CHECK, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, INSTA_ID, ACT_YN, MILEAGE FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND ACT_YN = 'Y'
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ENROLL_DATE, AD_CHECK, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, INSTA_ID, ACT_YN, MILEAGE FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND ACT_YN = 'Y'
